subject: Speedskating
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Latvia’s Haralds Silovs will compete in short- and long-track speedskating on the same day in Vancouver, the first time someone has done that at the Olympics.
snippet: Latvia’s Haralds Silovs will compete in short- and long-track speedskating on the same day in Vancouver, the first time someone has done that at the Olympics.
